Entries.AcceptGift_(O)337: Oh, wow! That's a rare element. It's theorised that all the iridium in our world comes from meteorites...$h
Entries.dating_Maru: Ummm... Don't break the news to my dad, okay? I'll handle it.
Entries.GreenRain: I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my mum is insisting we stay here...
Entries.Resort: I've been noticing a few different starfish species. My favourite are the big purple ones, but they're all very interesting!
Entries.Resort_Towel_2: We're so far removed from civilisation out here.#$b#Imagine the stars you could see at night.#$e#Who knows, maybe we'd even see a flying saucer or two!$h
Entries.Sat: Do you know my dad, Demetrius? He's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping him out in the laboratory.
Entries.Fri6: My dad is very logical, and my mum is very intuitive. That difference leads to conflict, sometimes...$s
Entries.event_robot1: Thanks. That means a lot to me, @.#$b#I know gadgets aren't really your kind of thing... but I do appreciate that you're showing interest in what I do.#$b#I wish I could return the favour somehow.$l
Entries.fall_Mon8: You should come visit me at the clinic tomorrow. I work from 10 o'clock to 4 o'clock.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my dad would flip.
